item.description: Creating an engaged workforce üíñ We apply behavioral principles and methods to answer questions of employee sentiment within the broader organizational system. An important component of this systemic change process includes our engagement survey developed in partnership with Eagle I.O. Engagement survey üíÉ The engagement survey responses are evaluated against norms representing most major U.S. metropolitan areas, with sparser international representation (see Figure 1).

eg was founded in 2022 by John Kulas (aka ‚ÄúJohn-o‚Äù), an Industrial and Organizational Psychologist. The foundation of the consultancy is on Statistical and Psychometric applications. The services provided are delivered within a systems-oriented framework of Organizational Development. The mission of eg includes a continuation of collaboration and mentorship for graduate students in Industrial and Organizational Psychology, and these students and former students contribute to eg‚Äôs services via structured contract assignments.

Process automation üöÄ We help organizations transition to -enabled automated work processes. Why ? Because it is: Powerful Flexible Free We rely on to drive all of our internal business functions. For example, we use the platform to scrape data from websites, automate reports, and consolidate data into centralized repositories. The system that we use is generalizable - your needs are of course unique but can also be automated via application of standard principles.

Professional resources üìö: We maintain libraries of resources that have been created over the years either by eg personnel or graduate students in Industrial and Organizational Psychology that have had a former association with Dr.¬†Kulas. These resources all share a goal of furthering the advancement of testing and assessment. A partial listing of these resources (as well as hyperlinks to the resources themselves) is presented below: R Resources: Working with RMarkdown (Garc√≠a Prieto Palacios Roji & Kulas, 2020) Working with GitHub (Garc√≠a Prieto Palacios Roji et al.

Assessments Auditing The sheer volume of assessments that organizations can accumulate can be overwhelming. Over 30 years of experience in authoring, validating, and implementing assessments gives us a unique perspective regarding assessment utility. An assessment audit evaluates the current cost and benefit of assessments used for purposes of selection, training, and employee experience. Returns on investment are calculated and the audited organization receives a comprehensive report regarding the relative cost and benefit of each individual assessment as well as the overall assessment strategy.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Engagement Survey Feedback Presentation Slides (Example/Tutorial)
item.description: background-image: url(https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/be/Sharingan_triple.svg) ??? Image credit: Wikimedia Commons class: inverse, center, middle Get Started Hello World Install the xaringan package from Github: remotes::install_github("yihui/xaringan") ‚Äì You are recommended to use the RStudio IDE, but you do not have to. Create a new R Markdown document from the menu File -> New File -> R Markdown -> From Template -> Ninja Presentation;1 ‚Äì
